Articles.Content:
Don't you annoyed when grammar people don't? Hate! Easy grammar is easy! Agree don't you?

(Yes, this is the result of boredom)

Fixed grammar is not. Variable word order can be.

Really, when about grammar people complain hate it I do, because pretty free it is as these sentences show.

you has a good idea to starts an new thread on these topic.

Edited July 8, 2013 by astropapi1

English bering my foreign language, I may make some mistakes.

Remember that English is used by almost everyone, and for ones who learns the language, it can be difficult to get a "everyday-life" level in that language. So be nice, but don't use "phonetic" SMS language or L33t speak too (the other extreme).
SO! I am i doing it right?

Do other languages have L33t speak? D3r M4nn 1557 etc.

Anyway, you speak english better than I speak [your language], so good job!

SO! I am i doing it right?

Your too wierd, their's alot of variation in grammer.
Grammar me got better than you! You grammar worthless is!
I grammar pay attention to is. Is important maybe grammar. Use please for all grammar us.

Do other languages have L33t speak? D3r M4nn 1557 etc.

Anyway, you speak english better than I speak [your language], so good job!

I'm French, and we are at school "forced" to learn english. But this is a great language don't get me wrong ^^

For my language there isn't a similar l33t speak, but there is the familiar SMS type of language where you have to really decrypt the message before reading it. "U mad?"
Side note, I like grammar. It annoys me when it's wrong

no thing anoise me more thn u ppl w/ur txt speak.

Arg, that hurt to type. It's one thing to use shorthand when you are limited by message length. There is no limit when posting on a forum, so there really isn't a reason to use such shorthand. You worked hard to learn those English skills, all that agonizing time you spent in school! Show it off by using it properly!

*the previous message was that of the poster and not the views of Squad*

Cheers!

Side note, I like grammar. It annoys me when it's wrong

lol u mad bout txt sp33k, u gramr ppl

That also hurt to type. I'm never going to leave you again. Also, to redeem myself, here is a nugget of wisdom:

Prepositions are not words that you should end sentences with.

Prepositions are not words that you should end sentences with.

Me : "Where is it at?"

Dad : "Between the a and the t."

I must have heard that a thousand times before it finally sank into my thick skull.
